##
## Create the target for the library
##
add_library(taglib SHARED ${SOURCES_LIST} ${HEADERS_LIST})

##
## Add all directories and sub-directories to the list of included directories
##
target_include_directories(taglib
                           PUBLIC ape
                                  asf
                                  flac
                                  it
                                  mod
                                  mp4
                                  mpc
                                  mpeg
                                  mpeg/id3v1
                                  mpeg/id3v2
                                  mpeg/id3v2/frames
                                  ogg
                                  ogg/flac
                                  ogg/opus
                                  ogg/speex
                                  ogg/vorbis
                                  riff
                                  riff/aiff
                                  riff/wav
                                  s3m
                                  toolkit
                                  trueaudio
                                  wavpack
                                  xm
                                  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

##
## Define some preprocessor definitions
##
target_compile_definitions(taglib
                           PRIVATE MAKE_TAGLIB_LIB
                                   WITH_ASF
                                   WITH_MP4)
